text: Uttamrao Patil was born at Malgaon in Chalisgaon tehsil of Jalgaon district in a farmer family. His school education was done at Raver. His college education was done at Baroda in an institute run by Raje Sayajirao Gaekwad. He did his Law graduation in Pune. It was in law college where he got acquainted with the thoughts of Vinayak Damodar Savarkar, N B Kher and Shyama Prasad Mukherjee whom he brought to law college as a guest speaker. He was a college debate secretary. He did his postgraduate studies at Kolhapur.

text: Suhail is the granddaughter of Khawaja Iftikhar, a tennis legend in Pakistan.
